questions.question: Has the user made at least 5 purchases in the last 60 days?
questions.criteria: Measures data completeness by purchase frequency over a recent 2-month period

questions.question: Is there at least one purchase recorded within the last 7 days?
questions.criteria: Confirms data recency based on the most recent shopping activity

questions.question: Has the user purchased items from 3 or more distinct product categories in the last 90 days?
questions.criteria: Evaluates completeness by diversity across product categories within a 3-month timeframe

questions.question: Does the user have at least 3 purchases from the same brand in the last 60 days?
questions.criteria: Measures personalization by identifying brand preference based on recent purchase patterns

questions.question: Has the user made two or more purchases within the same price range in the last 30 days?
questions.criteria: Assesses price sensitivity through consistent spending behavior in a 1-month period

questions.question: Are at least 80% of the user's purchases from the last 90 days recurring (repeat) purchases rather than one-time only?
questions.criteria: Evaluates data quality based on regularity and consistency of purchase behavior over 3 months
